name: Hard-Wired
description:
Hard-Wired

Puzzle your way through a 3D platformer but be careful not to let your battery run out! Plug yourself in for some cable-springing, bot-bouncing madness! 

Controls:

Move - WASD / Left Stick
Jump - Space / A (Controller)
Restart - R

Credits:

Design and Code: Zekiel, Cocosar07, Devskil
Music and SFX: Clay-Harris
Art: Andrej
